sentence: pick up the yellow block closest to the center and place it behind the red block on the left
rotate the foremost yellow block by 45 degrees and align it with the right side of the rearmost yellow block
pick up the middle green one among the other green blocks and place it behind the yellow block you just moved
place the red block which is in front of the yellow blocks to the top of the right yellow one behind it
align the foremost green block with the front side of the leftmost yellow block
stack the rightmost yellow block on top of the green block you just moved
